hcm.ssj.camera

Class CameraSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • hcm.ssj.core.Component
      • hcm.ssj.core.Sensor
        • hcm.ssj.camera.CameraSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback, java.lang.Runnable

    public class CameraSensor
extends Sensor
implements android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback
    Camera sensor.
    Hint: Heap size problems can be addressed by setting android:largeHeap="true" in the manifest.
    Created by Frank Gaibler on 21.12.2015.
